template<class ModelType, class ParametersJointDistributionType>
template<class ObsType , class RhoType , class T , class Generator >
std::vector<param_type> abc::ABC< ModelType, ParametersJointDistributionType >::pritchard_rejection_sampler ( unsigned int  N,
ObsType const &  y,
RhoType const &  rho,
T const &  epsilon,
Generator &  g 
) const
inline
Remarks
Pritchard & al (1999) likelyhood free rejection sampler.
Extension of Rubin sampler to the case of continuous sample spaces
see 'Approximate Bayesian Computations methods, Marin et al 2011, Algorithm 2)
